com.vmware.vapi.server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerInterface
extends Runnable
    Interface for an ApiProvider server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProtocolConnection getLocalConnection()
      Returns local connection to the primary API provider.
      void run()
      Runs the server.
      void stop()
      Stops the server.
      boolean waitForShutdown(long timeoutMillis)
      Wait for the server shutdown to complete.

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the server.

      • waitForShutdown

        boolean waitForShutdown(long timeoutMillis)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the server shutdown to complete. If the server is already shutdown, the method will return true immediately.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - maximum time to wait for the shutdown to complete (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        whether the shutdown completed or the timeout expired
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - the wait has been interrupted

      • run

        void run()
        Runs the server.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • getLocalConnection

        ProtocolConnection getLocalConnection()
        Returns local connection to the primary API provider. This connection can be used only by clients inside the same process.
        Returns:
        connection which involves no networking
